guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"e8tjc","text":"This protocol intends to provide concise instructions to carry out the experiment. For more comprehensive information, see Bruker's documentation \"Basic NMR Experiments\" by clicking ? →  Manuals (docs) on the menu bar on TopSpin. See also \"Pulse Program Catalogue. 1D/2D\" for the details about the pulse program used in this protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
